Şopar the Cat

October 15th, 2008 09:18   |   Category: Life, the Universe & Everything

This is the cleverest cat in the world called Şopar. And sometimes he is funny like other funny cats. And sometimes a pain in the …

Siamese are affectionate and intelligent cats, renowned for their social nature.1

They enjoy being with people and are sometimes described as “extroverts”. And as there are extrovert siamese, there also are very sensitive and nervous temperaments, which are not easily adapted to the changes of environment or to the strangers.1

They are extremely vocal, with a loud, low-pitched voice – known as “Meezer”, from which they get one of their nicknames – that has been compared to the cries of a human baby, and persistent in demanding attention.1

They also have a great need for human companionship. Often they bond strongly to a single person. These cats are typically active and playful, even as adults.1

More pictures of Şopar

1 Siamese at Wikipedia
